room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Our group played Prison Break and escaped with 3 minutes and 13 seconds to spare. The game was challenging but lots of fun. This was our first time in an escape room and it was a wonderful experience. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Prison break room was creative and incredibly fun!! We will definitely be checking out their other rooms, and look forward to the challenge!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: This was so much fun!! The owner was very helpful getting us started. The Prison Break Room was amazing, so well thought out and executed!! We can't wait to go back and try out the other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: We have done all three rooms. Jailbreak was our favorite. The place is clean and maintained, the games are challenging but solveable and not scary at all.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: We had a great time at the Escape Games OKC. We did Cabin in the Woods and enjoyed it so much that we went back the next weekend and did Prison Break. We had a so much fun because we never got frustrated. And that was because of the owner. Thanks so much see you soon for the 3rd room.
